section.title: Quality Assurance
section.para: In addition to the test suite the JBoss JCA project deploys various tools to increase the stability of the project.
The following sections will describe each of these tools.

section.title: Checkstyle
section.para: Checkstyle is a tool that verifies that the formatting of the source code in the project is consistent.
This allows for easier readability and a consistent feel of the project.
The home of checkstyle is located here: .

section.title: Findbugs
section.para: Findbugs is a tool that scans your project for bugs and provides reports based on its findings.
This tool helps lower of the number of bugs found in the JBoss JCA project.
The home of findbugs is located here: .

section.title: Cobertura
section.para: Cobertura generates a test suite matrix for your project which helps you identify where you need additional test coverage.
The reports that the tool provides makes sure that the JBoss JCA project has the correct test coverage.
The home of Cobertura is located here: .
